game.title: The Lost Treasure
game.description: Embark on an adventure to find the lost treasure of the ancient civilization. Solve puzzles, defeat enemies, and navigate through treacherous environments to claim the ultimate prize.
game.reward: Ancient artifact and a chest of gold coins

task.description: Travel to the forgotten island and search for the hidden cave where the ancient map is rumored to be located.
Study the ancient symbols and decipher the map to reveal the secret location of the treasure.
Battle against the guardians of the treasure to prove your worth and gain access to the final chamber.
Reach the heart of the temple and claim the long-lost treasure. Beware of traps and solve the final puzzle to unlock its true power.
